headerDisplay: For help and support please visit our GitHub Wiki. We hope you find this plugin useful!

apiKey.title: Govee API Key
apiKey.description: You can obtain your API key using this guide.

refreshTime.title: Refresh Timer
refreshTime.description: An interval (in seconds) in which your devices will refresh with Govee. Must be 15 or more.

controlInterval.title: Control Interval
controlInterval.description: A minimum delay (in milliseconds) between device updates being sent. Must be 500 or more.

disableDeviceLogging.title: Disable Device Logging
disableDeviceLogging.description: If checked, device updates will not be added to the log.

debug.title: Debug Logging
debug.description: If checked, more information will be added to the log.

disablePlugin.title: Disable Plugin
disablePlugin.description: If checked, the plugin will remove all accessories and not load the plugin on restart.

items.title: Govee Device ID
items.description: Govee Device ID of the device you wish to ignore, e.g. 12:AB:A1:C5:A8:99:D2:17.
